definitions.definition: An early human or closely related species, popularly held to reside in caves .
examples: The political cartoon showed the politician as a caveman , clubbing the budget depicted as a mammoth.

definitions.definition: A person with backward , primitive behavior, opinions, or interests.

subdefinitions.definition: A brutish person, one who behaves in a rough , uncivilized way.
Someone, especially a man, who has regressive , old-fashioned attitudes, particularly with regard to women; someone opposed to change or modernity .

main_definition: An early human or closely related species, popularly held to reside in caves .
secondary_definitions: ( informal , figuratively , derogatory ) A person with backward , primitive behavior, opinions, or interests.
